TAX_REPORT.GENERAL_TAX_COMPUTATION: General tax computation-used by taxpayer who only conducts taxable activities
TAX_REPORT.TOTAL_OUTPUT_TAX: Total output tax for current period
TAX_REPORT.CASH_REGISTER_UNIFORM_INVOICE: Cash register uniform invoice (triplicate) 、 Electronic invoice
TAX_REPORT.BUSINESS_TAX_PAYABLE: Accumulated offset against business tax payable for previous period
TAX_REPORT.DUPLICATE_UNIFORM_INVOICE: Duplicate uniform invoice、Cash register uniform invoice (Duplicate)
TAX_REPORT.FILING_OFFSET_AGAINST: Filing offset against business tax payable for current period
TAX_REPORT.ACCUMULATED_OFFSET_AGAINST: Accumulated offset against business tax payable for current period
TAX_REPORT.WAY_TO_RECEIVE_REFUND: Way to receive refund for current period(month)
TAX_REPORT.SOLD_BY_A_BONDED_ZONE: Sales amount of uniform invoice exemption for goods sold by a bonded zone business entity
TAX_REPORT.TO_A_TAXABLE_ZONE: to a taxable zone business entity through importation procedure
TAX_REPORT.DEDUCTION_COPY_OF_CASH_REGISTER_UNIFORM_: Deduction copy of Cash register uniform invoice (triplicate)、
TAX_REPORT.CERTIFICATE_BY_CUSTOMS: 3.Deduction copy of the certificate of payment for business tax collected by Customs
TAX_REPORT.CERTIFICATE_OF_RETURN_AND_ALLOWANCE: 4.Certificate of sales/purchases return and allowance、declaration of overpaid business tax returned by Customs
TAX_REPORT.ONE_TIME_TRANSFER_PRICING_ADJUSTMENT_STA: 7.One-Time Transfer Pricing Adjustment Statement for Business Tax
TAX_REPORT.OTHER_VOUCHERS: Other vouchers containing the amount of business tax
TAX_REPORT.INCLUDING_CASH_REGISTER: including Cash register duplicate uniform invoice
TAX_REPORT.CERTIFICATE_OF_PAYMENT_BY_CUSTOMS: Deduction copy of certificate of payment for business tax collected by Customs
TAX_REPORT.DEDUCTION_COPY_OF_CERTIFICATE_OF_PAYMENT: Deduction copy of certificate of payment
TAX_REPORT.FOR_BUSINESS_TAX_COLLECTED_BY_CUSTOMS: for business tax collected by Customs
TAX_REPORT.NAME: Name
TAX_REPORT.REMARKS_1: 1.This return is for the use of taxpayer who only conducts taxable activities and zero-tax-rate activities.
TAX_REPORT.REMARKS_2: 2.If sales for current period include sales that are exempted from VAT, or subject to gross business revenue tax, please use Form 403.
TAX_REPORT.REMARKS_3: 3.If a business entity has declared business tax for a one-time transfer pricing adjustment in accordance with the Ministry of Finance's Directive No. 10804629000 issued on November 15, 2019, except for cross-border controlled transactions involving imported goods, please also complete the 'One-Time Transfer Pricing Adjustment Statement for Business Tax' and attach the relevant supporting documents. These should be submitted along
TAX_REPORT.REMARKS_3_1: with the final business tax declaration for the same fiscal year.
TAX_REPORT.REMARKS_4: 4. If a taxpayer makes a statement regarding a significant matter in accordance with the proviso of Article 7, Paragraph 8 of the Taxpayer Rights Protection Act, please also complete the 'Business Tax Declaration Statement Form' and attach the relevant supporting documents.
TAX_REPORT.PAPER_SIZE: Paper size (297 × 210 mm), ODS file format
